General.Name: Recrusul S/A
General.Description: Recrusul S/A manufactures and sells transport and industrial refrigeration equipment in Brazil and internationally. It offers truck trailers and tractors. Recrusul S/A was founded in 1954 and is based in Sapucaia do Sul, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Luiz Pasteur, 1020, Sapucaia Do Sul, RS, Brazil, 93212-360
